abstract: Suicide bomber detonates explosives at mosque in northern Bangladesh, killing self and wounding three members of Ahmadiyya Muslim Community, sect often persecuted by conservative Muslims.
lead_paragraph: The bomber was the only person killed in the explosion, which wounded three worshipers in the mosque, in a remote northern village.

headline.main: Suicide Bomber Strikes at Ahmadi Mosque in Bangladesh
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Bangladesh: Bomber Attacks a Mosque

snippet: The bomber was the only person killed in the explosion, which wounded three worshipers in the mosque, in a remote northern village.
